B. Trees lining the park and the fountain in the center while aligning with the main road.  
C. The main road alignment, tall buildings near the coast, cars on the road, and pedestrians on the sidewalk.  
D. The city skyline and trees lining the park while aligning with the main thoroughfare.  
E. A row of skyscrapers and a broad view of city buildings while aligned with a major thoroughfare.
